content: worked * rectangle seamed together * flat * beginner crochet pattern model is a size us 8/10 or uk 12/14 and 1 70 meters or 5ft 6in finished size fits - one size fits most - s-xxl width - 25 inches - approx length - 62 75 inches - approx * this is an oversized asymmetrical poncho so it can fit many sizes * help on how to make this piece smaller and larger is given *** multiples are not included please do not ask - thank you *** yarn hayfield bonus aran - 880yards altogether hook size 8mm / us l/11 type of instructions this pattern has simple easy to follow written instructions and does not include any stitch charts the pattern is written using american standard crochet terms languages english only terms of use for personal use only do not copy share or sell the pattern in part or whole you may sell the finished item made using this pattern refund policy all digital sales are final pattern support & questions email hellotrulycrochet at gmail com about truly crochet is my blog where i share my latest free crochet patterns this version on etsy is an ad-free version of my free pattern
